    • About Krissy Mireles


    My success is a result of experience, integrity, dedication and the desire for excellence! I thrive on being the industry-leader and trusted resource for my clients while delivering them the BEST customer service for all their REAL ESTATE NEEDS! Nothing gives me more satisfaction than helping buyers and sellers accomplish their goals of acquiring or disposing of real estate. I have been selling real estate for over 22 years and have a passion for this industry and helping people. I am continually staying abreast with current changes, laws, market activity, mortgage rates, marketing and top of the line negotiating skills to help you achieve your goals.
